div.p: Packages are specially formatted files containing Entities, Audio & Graphics, that help users start creating games and import new media.
Both Meg and Lux Engine will auto-detect package that are stored in mokoigaming-1.0/packages sub directory in the 'User Data Directory' ( See your OS manual for location ).
Earlier Content Packages were just GZip compressed format with each files store as name length, name, file length and file data, now they share similar format to game and patch files.
